mapper.sql: pk_id, server_id, nickname, path, regex, is_monitor, is_delete, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_app (pk_id, server_id, nickname, path, regex, is_monitor, is_delete, create_time) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMonitor,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

pk_id,

mapper.update:
update t_app
server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regex = #{regex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_monitor = #{isMonitor,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where pk_id = #{pkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_app set server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regex = #{regex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_monitor = #{isMonitor,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pk_id = #{pkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_app where is_delete=0 and server_id=#{serverId}
